about_the_game:
Again is a simple 3D platform jumping game for developed and published by Redpix Games LLC.

At the time of release, the game contains 5 Levels of linearly increasing difficulty and the audio tracks created from scratch for this game specifically. Additional content may be available in the future.

The game tracks various statistics and displayed them currently only on the play menu level selection floating panel.

The game has an unusual main menu as the player is standing on a platform and has to jump on top of any platforms available around the starting point in the main menu. The game starts when you jump on top of the play platform and hold your Left Mouse Button (or right trigger on a controller) on a level card until it loads. You can drag the levels cards by holding Left Mouse Button (or right trigger on a controller) and moving your mouse (or controller look thumb stick) horizontally.

- Menu Navigation -
Move:
--- W A S D Keys
Look:
--- Mouse
Jump:
--- Space Key
Select Level:
--- Hold Left Mouse Button on the play menu floating panel that contains cards for each level.
--- Locked levels become accessible when the previous level is finished.

- In Game Controls -
Move:
--- WASD Keys
Look:
--- Mouse
Jump:
--- Space Key
Focus on the Next Platform:
--- F Key

Please enjoy the game and feel free to leave a review!

Hmm, I wonder what those notes mean and who left them there?

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: CPU with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
